title: Telecel Red Refer a Friend Promotion
description: Telecel's Red Refer A Friend Promotion is rewarding customers who refer a friend to sign up for any of our Telecel Red packages with a month's subscription for free.

title: All Night Long Bundles
description: You can now enjoy unlimited browsing between 11pm and 5am at ridiculuosly low prices with telecel's All night long bundles that start from as low as $1 for 2 nights of access

title: Telecel Lucky Number Promotion
description: Stand a chance to win awesome prizes. The promotion is open to all Telecel Go prepaid subscribers who are above 18 years of age and are holders of a valid ID or passport.

title: MegaBoost
description: The MegaBoost combo package gives you an affordable and convenient way to connect

title: Mega Bonus
description: Get 100% instant bonus with Mega Bonus every time you recharge

title: Switch Over Campaign
description: Switch over to Telecel and keep the last 6 digits of your number
